item.title: Asynchronous layout inflation
item.description: With recent release of Android Support Library, revision 24 Google developers baked into v4 library a new helper class for asynchronous inflation of layouts. Enter AsyncLayoutInflater You will find use for AsyncLayoutInflater in cases when you want to inflate parts of your applications UI lazily or as an response to users interactions. This helper class will allow your UI thread to continue being responsive while heavy inflation is being performed.
